title: Vajra Kamala Ear Studs: Exquisite Diamond & Gold Floral Ear Adornments
materials: G-H color). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster. Gold Weight: 3.500 grams. Net Weight: 3.446 grams.
features: Delicate floral design inspired by the Kamala (lotus) motif. The diamonds are meticulously pave-set within a raised prong setting to maximize brilliance. The openwork gold design adds a light and airy feel, enhancing the overall sparkle. Features a secure screw-back closure for comfortable all-day wear.
occasions: or as a cherished gift (Sambaram). Suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: A beautiful blend of traditional floral design and modern diamond setting techniques. Crafted with the highest quality 22K gold and ethically sourced diamonds. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the secure screw-back closure provides peace of mind. These earrings are a timeless addition to any jewelry collection, perfect as a Vara Lakshmi Vratham offering or for the modern woman who appreciates classic elegance.
